<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Chaining values within a given chunk (specifically the compress&#95;in&#95;place</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// interface) are represented as words. This avoids unnecessary bytes&lt;-&gt;words</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// conversion overhead in the portable implementation. However, the hash&#95;many</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// interface handles both user input and parent node blocks, so it accepts</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bytes. For that reason, chaining values in the CV stack are represented as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bytes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88" lineLink="#a92376f69320e66a51477df2b47088249"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#a2eb6f9e0395b47b8d5e3eeae4fe0c116">INLINE</a> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a92376f69320e66a51477df2b47088249">output&#95;chaining&#95;value</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/output-t">output&#95;t</a> &#42;self, uint8&#95;t cv&#91;32&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t cv&#95;words&#91;8&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  memcpy(cv&#95;words, self-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/output-t/#ac4f9eca5e279f34c50f6e70ad449a897">input&#95;cv</a>, 32);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a720451c4882eb74f48bb24d1af5b7368">blake3&#95;compress&#95;in&#95;place</a>(cv&#95;words, self-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/output-t/#a67fd92399759962d96519544c737be99">block</a>, self-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/output-t/#a1e73cd9626b6c0a7960af035596dbf7c">block&#95;len</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           self-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/output-t/#ab9a8543fae164eece122f39bcdaa0bf7">counter</a>, self-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/output-t/#abab5d28213b91ed5b976aa4eef0f6384">flags</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96" lineLink="#a0a194eae24fe95b572091dc7e992744f"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#a2eb6f9e0395b47b8d5e3eeae4fe0c116">INLINE</a> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a0a194eae24fe95b572091dc7e992744f">output&#95;root&#95;bytes</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/output-t">output&#95;t</a> &#42;self, uint64&#95;t seek, uint8&#95;t &#42;out,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> out&#95;len) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t output&#95;block&#95;counter = seek / 64;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> offset&#95;within&#95;block = seek % 64;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t wide&#95;buf&#91;64&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (out&#95;len &gt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a4a33a8bd63bbab7dc6625881ecf9cf4b">blake3&#95;compress&#95;xof</a>(self-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/output-t/#ac4f9eca5e279f34c50f6e70ad449a897">input&#95;cv</a>, self-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/output-t/#a67fd92399759962d96519544c737be99">block</a>, self-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/output-t/#a1e73cd9626b6c0a7960af035596dbf7c">block&#95;len</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    out&#95;len -= memcpy&#95;len;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    output&#95;block&#95;counter += 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    offset&#95;within&#95;block = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> input&#95;len) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a0fb8691f907fe586830601d486049e6e">make&#95;output</a>(self-&gt;cv, self-&gt;buf, self-&gt;buf&#95;len, self-&gt;chunk&#95;counter,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Given some input larger than one chunk, return the number of bytes that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// should go in the left subtree. This is the largest power-of-2 number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// chunks that leaves at least 1 byte for the right subtree.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162" lineLink="#af1487a6d4f0aec866d05311a3e42ab30"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#a2eb6f9e0395b47b8d5e3eeae4fe0c116">INLINE</a> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#af1487a6d4f0aec866d05311a3e42ab30">left&#95;len</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> content&#95;len) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Subtract 1 to reserve at least one byte for the right side. content&#95;len</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// should always be greater than BLAKE3&#95;CHUNK&#95;LEN.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> full&#95;chunks = (content&#95;len - 1) / <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#abcc4f732a672ef43bbfd2dc707e4d15e">BLAKE3&#95;CHUNK&#95;LEN</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#aa512c33323d4cb6599016c57337832fe">round&#95;down&#95;to&#95;power&#95;of&#95;2</a>(full&#95;chunks) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#abcc4f732a672ef43bbfd2dc707e4d15e">BLAKE3&#95;CHUNK&#95;LEN</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use SIMD parallelism to hash up to MAX&#95;SIMD&#95;DEGREE chunks at the same time</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on a single thread. Write out the chunk chaining values and return the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// number of chunks hashed. These chunks are never the root and never empty;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173" lineLink="#a5b7c95b4370497f963cb03981f87613f"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#a2eb6f9e0395b47b8d5e3eeae4fe0c116">INLINE</a> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a5b7c95b4370497f963cb03981f87613f">compress&#95;chunks&#95;parallel</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint8&#95;t &#42;input, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> input&#95;len,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint32&#95;t key&#91;8&#93;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       uint64&#95;t chunk&#95;counter, uint8&#95;t flags,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       uint8&#95;t &#42;out) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if defined(BLAKE3&#95;TESTING)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(0 &lt; input&#95;len);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(input&#95;len &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#a464a51e01f71c6dfc24ebba1126ff7dd">MAX&#95;SIMD&#95;DEGREE</a> &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#abcc4f732a672ef43bbfd2dc707e4d15e">BLAKE3&#95;CHUNK&#95;LEN</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (input&#95;len - input&#95;position &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#abcc4f732a672ef43bbfd2dc707e4d15e">BLAKE3&#95;CHUNK&#95;LEN</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    chunks&#95;array&#91;chunks&#95;array&#95;len&#93; = &amp;input&#91;input&#95;position&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">    input&#95;position += <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#abcc4f732a672ef43bbfd2dc707e4d15e">BLAKE3&#95;CHUNK&#95;LEN</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    chunks&#95;array&#95;len += 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a5ea78fa6f9e8732fc336ad0739d3e76e">blake3&#95;hash&#95;many</a>(chunks&#95;array, chunks&#95;array&#95;len,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, flags, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#af1f12c808c513e84d39a88930812b5cba1ee5b64a429be6a437f316619ccf377f">CHUNK&#95;START</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#af1f12c808c513e84d39a88930812b5cbad611fba49fcf900148ebefa6649d82fd">CHUNK&#95;END</a>, out);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Hash the remaining partial chunk, if there is one. Note that the empty</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#aed21153389299a4d7f8effa38ba58f3b">blake3&#95;chunk&#95;state</a> chunk&#95;state;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a4db94e2dcf16f8659a69b1636897baeb">chunk&#95;state&#95;init</a>(&amp;chunk&#95;state, key, flags);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">    chunk&#95;state.chunk&#95;counter = counter;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a1c4270490e141bac2a6053af9ef01f6b">chunk&#95;state&#95;update</a>(&amp;chunk&#95;state, &amp;input&#91;input&#95;position&#93;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       input&#95;len - input&#95;position);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/output-t">output&#95;t</a> output = <a href="#acc3e5ba813b5fb930b49c67f1edadf41">chunk&#95;state&#95;output</a>(&amp;chunk&#95;state);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a92376f69320e66a51477df2b47088249">output&#95;chaining&#95;value</a>(&amp;output, &amp;out&#91;chunks&#95;array&#95;len &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a54e230beb5e1d501702361fb91f399f0">BLAKE3&#95;OUT&#95;LEN</a>&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> chunks&#95;array&#95;len + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> chunks&#95;array&#95;len;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use SIMD parallelism to hash up to MAX&#95;SIMD&#95;DEGREE parents at the same time</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on a single thread. Write out the parent chaining values and return the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// number of parents hashed. (If there&#39;s an odd input chaining value left over,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// return it as an additional output.) These parents are never the root and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// never empty; those cases use a different codepath.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217" lineLink="#ab6b82b4dfe8b1cf5e6cdf18c4dd46097"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#a2eb6f9e0395b47b8d5e3eeae4fe0c116">INLINE</a> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#ab6b82b4dfe8b1cf5e6cdf18c4dd46097">compress&#95;parents&#95;parallel</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint8&#95;t &#42;child&#95;chaining&#95;values,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> num&#95;chaining&#95;values,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint32&#95;t key&#91;8&#93;, uint8&#95;t flags,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                        uint8&#95;t &#42;out) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if defined(BLAKE3&#95;TESTING)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(2 &lt;= num&#95;chaining&#95;values);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(num&#95;chaining&#95;values &lt;= 2 &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#a8ee4a6d154e907312d4a54eb962388da">MAX&#95;SIMD&#95;DEGREE&#95;OR&#95;2</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint8&#95;t &#42;parents&#95;array&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#a8ee4a6d154e907312d4a54eb962388da">MAX&#95;SIMD&#95;DEGREE&#95;OR&#95;2</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> parents&#95;array&#95;len = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (num&#95;chaining&#95;values - (2 &#42; parents&#95;array&#95;len) &gt;= 2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">    parents&#95;array&#91;parents&#95;array&#95;len&#93; =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &amp;child&#95;chaining&#95;values&#91;2 &#42; parents&#95;array&#95;len &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a54e230beb5e1d501702361fb91f399f0">BLAKE3&#95;OUT&#95;LEN</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">    parents&#95;array&#95;len += 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a5ea78fa6f9e8732fc336ad0739d3e76e">blake3&#95;hash&#95;many</a>(parents&#95;array, parents&#95;array&#95;len, 1, key,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   0, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Parents always use counter 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, flags | <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#af1f12c808c513e84d39a88930812b5cba283df3974c567b21c067198a24cd78e6">PARENT</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   0, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Parents have no start flags.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   0, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Parents have no end flags.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   out);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there&#39;s an odd child left over, it becomes an output.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (num&#95;chaining&#95;values &gt; 2 &#42; parents&#95;array&#95;len) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    memcpy(&amp;out&#91;parents&#95;array&#95;len &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a54e230beb5e1d501702361fb91f399f0">BLAKE3&#95;OUT&#95;LEN</a>&#93;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">           &amp;child&#95;chaining&#95;values&#91;2 &#42; parents&#95;array&#95;len &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a54e230beb5e1d501702361fb91f399f0">BLAKE3&#95;OUT&#95;LEN</a>&#93;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">           <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a54e230beb5e1d501702361fb91f399f0">BLAKE3&#95;OUT&#95;LEN</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> parents&#95;array&#95;len + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> parents&#95;array&#95;len;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The wide helper function returns (writes out) an array of chaining values</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and returns the length of that array. The number of chaining values returned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is the dyanmically detected SIMD degree, at most MAX&#95;SIMD&#95;DEGREE. Or fewer,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if the input is shorter than that many chunks. The reason for maintaining a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// wide array of chaining values going back up the tree, is to allow the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// implementation to hash as many parents in parallel as possible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// As a special case when the SIMD degree is 1, this function will still return</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// at least 2 outputs. This guarantees that this function doesn&#39;t perform the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// root compression. (If it did, it would use the wrong flags, and also we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// wouldn&#39;t be able to implement exendable ouput.) Note that this function is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not used when the whole input is only 1 chunk long; that&#39;s a different</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// codepath.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Why not just have the caller split the input on the first update(), instead</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of implementing this special rule? Because we don&#39;t want to limit SIMD or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// multi-threading parallelism for that update().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269" lineLink="#a6f1fd4d6d509893d09c8b8eb1aa5291c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a6f1fd4d6d509893d09c8b8eb1aa5291c">blake3&#95;compress&#95;subtree&#95;wide</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint8&#95;t &#42;input,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> input&#95;len,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint32&#95;t key&#91;8&#93;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           uint64&#95;t chunk&#95;counter,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           uint8&#95;t flags, uint8&#95;t &#42;out) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that the single chunk case does &#42;not&#42; bump the SIMD degree up to 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when it is 1 If this implementation adds multi-threading in the future,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this gives us the option of multi-threading even the 2-chunk case, which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can help performance on smaller platforms.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (input&#95;len &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a6e3c3e900f34e7af779867b28b54336d">blake3&#95;simd&#95;degree</a>() &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#abcc4f732a672ef43bbfd2dc707e4d15e">BLAKE3&#95;CHUNK&#95;LEN</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a5b7c95b4370497f963cb03981f87613f">compress&#95;chunks&#95;parallel</a>(input, input&#95;len, key, chunk&#95;counter, flags,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    out);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// With more than simd&#95;degree chunks, we need to recurse. Start by dividing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the input into left and right subtrees. (Note that this is only optimal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as long as the SIMD degree is a power of 2 If we ever get a SIMD degree</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of 3 or something, we&#39;ll need a more complicated strategy.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> left&#95;input&#95;len = <a href="#af1487a6d4f0aec866d05311a3e42ab30">left&#95;len</a>(input&#95;len);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> right&#95;input&#95;len = input&#95;len - left&#95;input&#95;len;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint8&#95;t &#42;right&#95;input = &amp;input&#91;left&#95;input&#95;len&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t right&#95;chunk&#95;counter =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">      chunk&#95;counter + (uint64&#95;t)(left&#95;input&#95;len / <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#abcc4f732a672ef43bbfd2dc707e4d15e">BLAKE3&#95;CHUNK&#95;LEN</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make space for the child outputs. Here we use MAX&#95;SIMD&#95;DEGREE&#95;OR&#95;2 to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// account for the special case of returning 2 outputs when the SIMD degree</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t cv&#95;array&#91;2 &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#a8ee4a6d154e907312d4a54eb962388da">MAX&#95;SIMD&#95;DEGREE&#95;OR&#95;2</a> &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a54e230beb5e1d501702361fb91f399f0">BLAKE3&#95;OUT&#95;LEN</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> degree = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a6e3c3e900f34e7af779867b28b54336d">blake3&#95;simd&#95;degree</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (left&#95;input&#95;len &gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#abcc4f732a672ef43bbfd2dc707e4d15e">BLAKE3&#95;CHUNK&#95;LEN</a> &amp;&amp; degree == 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The special case: We always use a degree of at least two, to make</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sure there are two outputs. Except, as noted above, at the chunk</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// level, where we allow degree=1. (Note that the 1-chunk-input case is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a different codepath.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">    degree = 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t &#42;right&#95;cvs = &amp;cv&#95;array&#91;degree &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a54e230beb5e1d501702361fb91f399f0">BLAKE3&#95;OUT&#95;LEN</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Recurse! If this implementation adds multi-threading support in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// future, this is where it will go.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> left&#95;n = <a href="#a6f1fd4d6d509893d09c8b8eb1aa5291c">blake3&#95;compress&#95;subtree&#95;wide</a>(input, left&#95;input&#95;len, key,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                               chunk&#95;counter, flags, cv&#95;array);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> right&#95;n = <a href="#a6f1fd4d6d509893d09c8b8eb1aa5291c">blake3&#95;compress&#95;subtree&#95;wide</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">      right&#95;input, right&#95;input&#95;len, key, right&#95;chunk&#95;counter, flags, right&#95;cvs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The special case again. If simd&#95;degree=1, then we&#39;ll have left&#95;n=1 and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// right&#95;n=1. Rather than compressing them into a single output, return</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// them directly, to make sure we always have at least two outputs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (left&#95;n == 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">    memcpy(out, cv&#95;array, 2 &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a54e230beb5e1d501702361fb91f399f0">BLAKE3&#95;OUT&#95;LEN</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, do one layer of parent node compression.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> num&#95;chaining&#95;values = left&#95;n + right&#95;n;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#ab6b82b4dfe8b1cf5e6cdf18c4dd46097">compress&#95;parents&#95;parallel</a>(cv&#95;array, num&#95;chaining&#95;values, key, flags,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   out);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Hash a subtree with compress&#95;subtree&#95;wide(), and then condense the resulting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// list of chaining values down to a single parent node. Don&#39;t compress that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// last parent node, however. Instead, return its message bytes (the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// concatenated chaining values of its children). This is necessary when the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// first call to update() supplies a complete subtree, because the topmost</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// parent node of that subtree could end up being the root. It&#39;s also necessary</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for extended output in the general case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// As with compress&#95;subtree&#95;wide(), this function is not used on inputs of 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// chunk or less. That&#39;s a different codepath.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338" lineLink="#abd0aa960e3f0e3ebab8baccea1f3808a"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#a2eb6f9e0395b47b8d5e3eeae4fe0c116">INLINE</a> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#abd0aa960e3f0e3ebab8baccea1f3808a">compress&#95;subtree&#95;to&#95;parent&#95;node</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint8&#95;t &#42;input, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> input&#95;len, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint32&#95;t key&#91;8&#93;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t chunk&#95;counter, uint8&#95;t flags, uint8&#95;t out&#91;2 &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a54e230beb5e1d501702361fb91f399f0">BLAKE3&#95;OUT&#95;LEN</a>&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if defined(BLAKE3&#95;TESTING)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(input&#95;len &gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#abcc4f732a672ef43bbfd2dc707e4d15e">BLAKE3&#95;CHUNK&#95;LEN</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t cv&#95;array&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#a8ee4a6d154e907312d4a54eb962388da">MAX&#95;SIMD&#95;DEGREE&#95;OR&#95;2</a> &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a54e230beb5e1d501702361fb91f399f0">BLAKE3&#95;OUT&#95;LEN</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> num&#95;cvs = <a href="#a6f1fd4d6d509893d09c8b8eb1aa5291c">blake3&#95;compress&#95;subtree&#95;wide</a>(input, input&#95;len, key,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                chunk&#95;counter, flags, cv&#95;array);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(num&#95;cvs &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#a8ee4a6d154e907312d4a54eb962388da">MAX&#95;SIMD&#95;DEGREE&#95;OR&#95;2</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If MAX&#95;SIMD&#95;DEGREE is greater than 2 and there&#39;s enough input,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// compress&#95;subtree&#95;wide() returns more than 2 chaining values. Condense</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// them into 2 by forming parent nodes repeatedly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t out&#95;array&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#a8ee4a6d154e907312d4a54eb962388da">MAX&#95;SIMD&#95;DEGREE&#95;OR&#95;2</a> &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a54e230beb5e1d501702361fb91f399f0">BLAKE3&#95;OUT&#95;LEN</a> / 2&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The second half of this loop condition is always true, and we just</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// asserted it above. But GCC can&#39;t tell that it&#39;s always true, and if NDEBUG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is set on platforms where MAX&#95;SIMD&#95;DEGREE&#95;OR&#95;2 == 2, GCC emits spurious</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// warnings here. GCC 8.5 is particularly sensitive, so if you&#39;re changing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this code, test it against that version.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (num&#95;cvs &gt; 2 &amp;&amp; num&#95;cvs &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#a8ee4a6d154e907312d4a54eb962388da">MAX&#95;SIMD&#95;DEGREE&#95;OR&#95;2</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">    num&#95;cvs =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="#ab6b82b4dfe8b1cf5e6cdf18c4dd46097">compress&#95;parents&#95;parallel</a>(cv&#95;array, num&#95;cvs, key, flags, out&#95;array);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">    memcpy(cv&#95;array, out&#95;array, num&#95;cvs &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a54e230beb5e1d501702361fb91f399f0">BLAKE3&#95;OUT&#95;LEN</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">  memcpy(out, cv&#95;array, 2 &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a54e230beb5e1d501702361fb91f399f0">BLAKE3&#95;OUT&#95;LEN</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367" lineLink="#a3b12f6c109442edaa63ab03ba8a6caec"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#a2eb6f9e0395b47b8d5e3eeae4fe0c116">INLINE</a> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a3b12f6c109442edaa63ab03ba8a6caec">hasher&#95;init&#95;base</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a720ce7ad2dc122aeb214c6a5d4731f46">blake3&#95;hasher</a> &#42;self, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint32&#95;t key&#91;8&#93;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             uint8&#95;t flags) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">  memcpy(self-&gt;key, key, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a947bd80c6cdcbd362dd0760f3603abe6">BLAKE3&#95;KEY&#95;LEN</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a4db94e2dcf16f8659a69b1636897baeb">chunk&#95;state&#95;init</a>(&amp;self-&gt;chunk, key, flags);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">  self-&gt;cv&#95;stack&#95;len = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374" lineLink="#a3723853888e765d1049d9f3b9e48dfed"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a3723853888e765d1049d9f3b9e48dfed">llvm&#95;blake3&#95;hasher&#95;init</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a720ce7ad2dc122aeb214c6a5d4731f46">blake3&#95;hasher</a> &#42;self) &#123; <a href="#a3b12f6c109442edaa63ab03ba8a6caec">hasher&#95;init&#95;base</a>(self, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/blake3-impl-h/#a78823051d1dad34b9b3d8120112e674d">IV</a>, 0); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383" lineLink="#acf30a68b4c258e1c1af255c60e880aac"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#acf30a68b4c258e1c1af255c60e880aac">llvm&#95;blake3&#95;hasher&#95;init&#95;derive&#95;key&#95;raw</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a720ce7ad2dc122aeb214c6a5d4731f46">blake3&#95;hasher</a> &#42;self, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;context,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a720ce7ad2dc122aeb214c6a5d4731f46">blake3&#95;hasher</a> context&#95;hasher;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a6f1551c11ac8a08c294ee4bf7bf08623">llvm&#95;blake3&#95;hasher&#95;finalize</a>(&amp;context&#95;hasher, context&#95;key, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/blake3/llvm-blake3-prefix-h/#a947bd80c6cdcbd362dd0760f3603abe6">BLAKE3&#95;KEY&#95;LEN</a>);</span></CodeLine>
